title.rendered: Cara Delevingne Brings Home “Bacon” with Latest Tattoo

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Cara Delevingne has brought home the “Bacon” with her latest tattoo.

Literally!

The model, who is never afraid to go topless, is also unafraid to ink her body with some unusual pieces of so-called art.

The latest, which we are absolutely not making up, is a tattoo of the word “Bacon” on the bottom of her foot, an addition Delevingne shared via Instagram a few days ago.

“It happened… @bangbangnyc BACON…” Delevingne wrote as a caption to the image, referencing the famous tattoo parlor known for inking such other stars as Justin Bieber.

 

We all love bacon, of course. We even bought our interns this bacon-scented alarm clock for Christmas last year.

But would we want this word permanently etched on our skin? Probably not.

Like so many other celebrities with tattoos, Delevingne may one day regret this decision…

27 Tattoos These Celebrities May One Day Regret

VIEW GALLERY
